yada#gnEq yAniq kAniq cA&&tEq dArU#Ni daqddhmasi# | 
tada#stuq tuByaqmid-GRuqtaM tajju#Shasva yaviShThya || 
yadattyu#paqjihvi#kAq yadvaqmrO a#tiqsarpa#ti | 
sarvaqM tada#stu tE GRuqtaM tajju#Shasva yaviShThya || 
rAtri(gm)# rAtriqmapra#yAvaqM BaraqntO&SvA#yEvaq tiShTha#tE GAqsama#smai | 
rAqyaspOShE#Naq samiqShA madaqntO&gnEq mA tEq prati#vESA riShAma || 
nABA# - [  ] 38
